name: Ninho Pacifico
description: 'Ninho' means nest in Portuguese, and the name's a nod to one of Brian Block's favorite beers, Hitachino White Nest beer. This cocktail also includes a distilled version of the beer. Blood oranges add a lovely color if you can find them.
recipeIngredient: 1 ounces Kiuchi No Shizuku Hitachino Nest Distilled White Ale
Garnish: blood orange wedge, sprig of cilantro

recipeInstructions.text: Muddle blood orange and cilantro in cocktail shaker. Fill shaker with ice and add distilled Hitachino spirit to mixture. Shake and strain into ice-filled collins glass, and top with beer. Garnish with wedge of blood orange and sprig of cilantro.
